biotools.summary: This tool can be used to enrich lists of genes found at a suspected disease locus. Given a list of genes, it will return a ranked list ordered by the likelihood of involvement in disease.

bioschemas.name: Prospectr
bioschemas.summary: This tool can be used to enrich lists of genes found at a suspected disease locus. Given a list of genes, it will return a ranked list ordered by the likelihood of involvement in disease.
